snippet: Sioux Falls Storm quarterback Chris Dixon, a three-time Indoor Football League most valuable player, signed with the Orlando Predators of the Arena Football League.
lead_paragraph: Sioux Falls Storm quarterback Chris Dixon, a three-time Indoor Football League most valuable player, signed with the Orlando Predators of the Arena Football League.

headline.seo: Quarterback Chris Dixon Moves to the Arena League
headline.main: Quarterback Chris Dixon Moves to the Arena League
headline.print_headline: Dixon Moves to the Arena League
